title: Can I get a reason behind my account being permanently suspended out of no where?
body: Really curiously as to why I got permanently suspended. Could someone at Riot please check my account and tell me what is going on?

replies.body:
Don't fret just yet!! It looks like this was *not* a permanent suspension, but rather a form of protection since our system noticed some possible hacking attempts by someone other than yourself. Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to start the recovery process! 

I know that messaging is kind of awkward, hopefully we can get that adjusted at some point so it's not so midleading for you!
